hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="origin" published_version="3.6.1"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
##Build for Openshift origin 3.6.1 sudo yum install -y git tar which wget make gcc createrepo bsdtar krb5-devel rsync go rpm-build gpgme-devel libassuan-devel curl "https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py" -o "get-pip.py" sudo python get-pip.py sudo pip install blessings bugzilla python-bugzilla
#wget ftp://ftp.unicamp.br/pub/linuxpatch/s390x/redhat/rhel7.3/docker-17.05.0-ce-rhel7.3-20170523.tar.gz #tar -xzvf docker-17.05.0-ce-rhel7.3-20170523.tar.gz
export GOPATH=$HOME/go export PATH=$PATH:$GOPATH/bin #export PATH=$PATH:$GOPATH/bin:$HOME/docker-17.05.0-ce-rhel7.3-20170523 export OS_OUTPUT_GOPATH=1 mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/openshift cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/openshift git clone https://github.com/openshift/origin.git cd origin git checkout tags/v3.6.1 -b v3.6.1 make clean build
